content: this legal text explains the progress of a cause between two parties the first party mr be has declared a legal cohabitation and is transferring undivided rights to a property to the second party mrs vn the property is a dwelling house in uccle and has gone through various transfers and divorces the assignee party will now take full ownership and occupancy of the property subject to certain conditions the text also mentions the mortgage situation and the balance of the price to be paid by the assignee party the parties have agreed to distribute their joint ownership property pay property taxes and divide their group insurance and pension savings they have also settled any maintenance claims and renounced any future claims or actions related to the liquidation the document is considered an authentic instrument and has been signed by the parties in the presence of notaries
